src_original: buddhyā yāvannavamī bodhisattvabhūmiriti suvicitavicayaḥ suparipūrṇaśukladharmaḥ  paryantasaṃbhāropacayopacitaḥ suparigṛhītamahāpuṇyajñānasaṃbhāraḥ mahākaruṇāvaipulyādhigataḥ  lokadhātuvibhaktivaimātryakovidaḥ sattvadhātupraviṣṭagahanopacāraḥ tathāgatagocarapraveśānugatasaṃjñāmanasikāraḥ
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩從初地乃至第九地，以如是無量智慧觀察覺了已，善思惟修習，善滿足白法，集無邊助道法，增長大福德智慧，廣行大悲，知世界差別，入眾生界稠林，入如來所行處，隨順如來寂滅行，常觀察如來力、無所畏、不共佛法，名為：

src_original: balavaiśāradyabuddhadharmādhyālambanānugataḥ sarvākārasarvajñajñānābhiṣekabhūmiprāpta ityucyate //

src_original: sāgaragarbhaśca nāma /  sāgarasamṛddhiśca nāma /  ākāśadhātuvipulaśca nāma /  sarvadharmasvabhāvavicayaśca nāma /  sarvasattvacittacaritānugataśca nāma /  pratyutpannasarvabuddhasaṃmukhāvasthitaśca nāma bodhisattvasamādhirāmukhībhavati /  tasaivaṃpramukhāni daśa samādhyasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇyāmukhībhavanti /
tgt_original: 菩薩摩訶薩以如是智慧入受職地已，即得菩薩離垢三昧、入法界差別三昧、莊嚴道場三昧、一切種華光三昧、海藏三昧、海印三昧、虛空界廣大三昧、觀一切法自性三昧、知一切眾生心行三昧、一切佛皆現前三昧，如是等百萬阿僧祇三昧皆現在前。

src_original: sa tān sarvān samādhīn samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca,  samādhikauśalyānugataśca yāvatsamādhikāryaṃ tatsarvaṃ pratyanubhavati /

src_original: tasya yāvaddaśasamādhyasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇāṃ paryante sarvajñajñānaviśeṣābhiṣekavānnāma bodhisattvasamādhirāmukhībhavati //
tgt_original: 其最後三昧，名： 受一切智勝職位。

src_original: yasmin samanantarābhimukhībhūte daśatrisāhasraśatasahasrāparyantapramāṇaṃ mahāratnarājapadmaṃ  prādurbhavati sarvākārararatnapratyarpitaṃ sarvalokaviṣayasamatikrāntaṃ lokottarakuśalamūlasaṃbhūtaṃ
tgt_original: 此三昧現在前時，有大寶蓮華忽然出生。 其華廣大，量等百萬三千大千世界，以眾妙寶間錯莊嚴，超過一切世間境界；

src_original: māyāsvabhāvagocarapariniṣpannaṃ dharmadhātusuvyavasthitāvabhāsaṃ divyaviṣayasamatikrāntaṃ

src_original: mahāvaiḍūryamaṇiratnadaṇḍamatulyacandanarājakarṇikaṃ mahāśmagarbhakesaraṃ jāmbūnadasuvarṇāvabhāsapatramaparimitaraśmisaṃkusumitaśarīraṃ  sarvapravararatnapratyuptagarbhamaparyantamahāratnajālasaṃchannaṃ paripūrṇadaśatrisāhasraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamamahāratnapadmaparivāram
tgt_original: 毘瑠璃摩尼寶為莖，栴檀王為臺，碼碯為鬚，閻浮檀金為葉，其華常有無量光明，眾寶為藏，寶網彌覆，十三千大千世界微塵數蓮華以為眷屬。

src_original: tadanugatastadanurūpaśca tasya bodhisattvasya kāyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate /

src_original: sa tasya sarvajñajñānaviśeṣābhiṣekavataḥ samādheḥ sahapratilambhāttasminmahāratnarājapadme niṣaṇṇaḥ saṃdṛśyate /  samanantaraniṣaṇṇaśca sa bodhisattvastasmin mahāratnarājapadme,  atha yāvanti tasya mahāratnarājapadmasya mahāpadmāni parivāraḥ prādurbhūtaḥ,  tāvanto bodhisattvā daśadiglokadhātusaṃnipatitāstaṃ bodhisattvamanuparivārya teṣu mahāratnapadmeṣu niṣīdanti /  ekaikaśca teṣāṃ daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇi samāpadyate tameva bodhisattvaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ //
tgt_original: 無量菩薩以為眷屬，各坐其餘蓮華之上，周匝圍遶，一一各得百萬三昧，向大菩薩一心瞻仰。

src_original: sarvalokadhātupariśodhanaṃ ca,  sarvabuddhakṣetranāmadheyarutānanuravaṇaṃ ca,  sarvasabhāgacaritabodhisattvasaṃnipātanaṃ (Dbh 56)  ca sarvalokadhātudevamanuṣyatūryasaṃgītisaṃpravādanaṃ ca sarvasattvasukhasaṃjananaṃ  ca sarvasamyaksaṃbuddhācintyapūjopasthānapravartanaṃ ca sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalavijñāpanaṃ ca bhavati /
tgt_original: 此大菩薩并其眷屬坐華座時，所有光明及以言音普皆充滿十方法界，一切世界咸悉震動，惡趣休息，國土嚴淨，同行菩薩靡不來集，人天音樂同時發聲，所有眾生悉得安樂，以不思議供養之具供一切佛，諸佛眾會悉皆顯現。

src_original: tathā hi bho jinaputrāstasya bodhisattvasya samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya tasmin mahāratnarājapadme adhastāccaraṇatalābhyāṃ daśaraśmyasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti /  niścarya daśadiśamavīciparyantān mahānirayānavabhāsayanti /  nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhāni pratiprasrambhayati /
tgt_original: 此菩薩坐彼大蓮華座時，於兩足下放百萬阿僧祇光明，普照十方諸大地獄，滅眾生苦；

src_original: jānumaṇḍalābhyāṃ daśa ... daśadiśaṃ sarvatiryagyonibhavanānyavabhāsayanti,  sarvatiryagyoniduḥkhāni ca praśamayanti /
tgt_original: 於兩膝輪放百萬阿僧祇光明，普照十方諸畜生趣，滅眾生苦；

src_original: nābhimaṇḍalād daśa ... sarvayamalokabhavanāni avabhāsayanti,  sarvayamalaukikānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhāni ca praśamayanti /
tgt_original: 於𪗇輪中放百萬阿僧祇光明，普照十方閻羅王界，滅眾生苦；

src_original: vāmadakṣiṇābhyāṃ pārśvābhyāṃ ... manuṣyāśrayān ... manuṣya ... /  ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāṃ devāsurabhavanāni ... devāsura ... /  aṃsābhyāṃ ... śrāvakayānīyāśrayānavabhāsayanti,  mukhadvārād ... prathamacittopādamupādāya yāvannavamīṃ bhūmimanuprāptān bodhisattvānavabhāsayanti,
tgt_original: 從左右脇放百萬阿僧祇光明，普照十方一切人趣，滅眾生苦； 從兩手中放百萬阿僧祇光明，普照十方一切諸天及阿脩羅所有宮殿；

src_original: ūrṇākośāddaśaraśmyasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti,  niścarya daśasu dikṣu sarvamārabhavanānyavabhāsya dhyāmīkṛtya abhiṣekabhūmiprāptān bodhisattvān avabhāsya tatkāyeṣvevāstaṃ gacchanti /
tgt_original: 從其面門放百萬阿僧祇光明，普照十方初始發心乃至九地諸菩薩身； 從兩眉間放百萬阿僧祇光明，普照十方受職菩薩，令魔宮殿悉皆不現；

src_original: uparyuttamāṅgāt paripūrṇadaśatrisāhasrāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamā raśmayo niścaranti,  niścarya daśasu dikṣu dharmadhātupramāṇānyākāśadhātuparyavasānāni sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalānyavabhāsya  daśākāraṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya uparikhagapathe sthitvā mahāraśmijālamaṇḍalāni
tgt_original: 從其頂上放百萬阿僧祇三千大千世界微塵數光明，普照十方一切世界諸佛如來道場眾會，右遶十匝，住虛空中，成光明網，名：

src_original: kṛtvā uttaptaprabhāsaṃ nāma mahattathāgatapūjopasthānaṃ sarvatathāgatānāmanupravartayanti /  tasya pūjopasthānasya prathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvannavamībhūmyanupravartitam tathāgatapūjopasthānaṃ ... /
tgt_original: 熾然光明，發起種種諸供養事供養於佛，餘諸菩薩從初發心乃至九地所有供養而比於此，百分不及一，乃至算數譬諭所不能及。

src_original: tataḥ khalvapi mahāraśmijālamaṇḍalādyāvatī daśasu dikṣu niravaśeṣasarvadharmadhātvantargatā  puṣpaprajñaptirvā gandhadhūpamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvastrābharaṇamaṇiratnaprajñaptirvā,  tato 'tiriktatarāḥ sarvalokaviṣayasamatikrāntā lokottarakuśalamūlasaṃbhārādhipatyābhinirvṛttāḥ  sarvākāraguṇasaṃpannā acintyanirvāṇādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitā nānāvyūhamahāratnavarṣā iva  ekaikatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍale mahāmeghā ivābhipravarṣanti sma /
tgt_original: 其光明網普於十方一一如來眾會之前，雨眾妙香、華鬘、衣服、幢幡、寶蓋、諸摩尼等莊嚴之具以為供養，皆從出世善根所生，超過一切世間境界。

src_original: tāṃ ca ye sattvāḥ pūjāṃ saṃjānante,  te sarve niyatā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
tgt_original: 若有眾生見知此者，皆於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提得不退轉。

src_original: evaṃrūpaṃ pūjopasthānaṃ pravartya tā raśmayaḥ punareva sarvāvanti tathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalānyavabhāsya  daśākāraṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmadhastātkramataleṣu astaṃ gacchanti /
tgt_original: 「佛子！ 此大光明作於如是供養事畢，復遶十方一切世界一一諸佛道場眾會，經十匝已，從諸如來足下而入。

src_original: tatasteṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ viditaṃ bhavati - amuṣmin lokadhātuprasare evaṃcaryānugato bodhisattvo 'bhiṣekakālaprāpta iti
tgt_original: 爾時，諸佛及諸菩薩，知某世界中，某菩薩摩訶薩能行如是廣大之行到受職位。 佛子！

src_original: tatra bho jinaputrā daśabhyo digbhyo 'paryantebhyo lokadhātuprasarebhyo 'prameyāsaṃkhyeyāparyantā  bodhisattvā yāvannavamībodhisattvabhūmipratiṣṭhitā āgatya taṃ bodhisattvamanuparivārya  mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tameva bodhisattvaṃ (Dbh 57)
tgt_original: 是時，十方無量無邊乃至九地諸菩薩眾皆來圍遶，恭敬供養，一心觀察。

src_original: nirīkṣamāṇā daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇi samāpadyante /
tgt_original: 正觀察時，其諸菩薩即各獲得十千三昧。

src_original: abhiṣekabhūmiprāptānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ kāyebhyaḥ śrīvatsālaṃkārādvajrasvastikāt sarvamāraśatruvijayo nāmaikaikā mahāraśmirdaśaraśmyasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasraparivārā  niścarya daśadiśo 'vabhāsya aparyantāni prātihāryāṇi saṃdarśya tasya bodhisattvasya śrīvatsālaṃkāre vajrasvastika evāstaṃ gacchati /

src_original: sādhu sādhu girisārasākaya (?)  deśito viduna śīlasaṃvaraḥ /  sarvasattvakaruṇāya āśayo bhūmiśreṣṭha dvitiyāya gocaraḥ // 2 //
tgt_original: 讚言： 「善哉大山王，　　慈心愍念諸眾生，善說智者律儀法，　　第二地中之行相。

src_original: bhūtatattva vitathāmananyathā bodhisasattvacaraṇaṃ manoramam /
tgt_original: 是諸菩薩微妙行，　　真實無異無差別，

src_original: sarvalokahitaśaukhyacintanā deśitaṃ tu paramaprabhāsvaram // 3 //
tgt_original: 為欲利益諸群生，　　如是演說最清淨。

src_original: bhūyu bhūyu naradevapūjitāṃ bhūmiśreṣṭha tṛtiyāmudāhara /
tgt_original: 一切人天供養者，　　願為演說第三地，

src_original: dharmajñānakriyamukti sūcaya yādṛśo 'nubhava tādṛ(śo) gocaraḥ // 4 //
tgt_original: 與法相應諸智業，　　如其境界希具闡！

src_original: dānaśīlacaraṇaṃ maharṣiṇāṃ kṣāntivīryaśamaprajñupāyatām /
tgt_original: 大仙所有施戒法，　　忍辱精進禪智慧，

src_original: maitraśreṣṭha karuṇāya mārgaṇaṃ bhāṣadhvaṃ jinacarīviśodhanam // 5 //
tgt_original: 及以方便慈悲道，　　佛清淨行願皆說！

src_original: vimukticandra uvāca vajragarbhaviśāradam /
tgt_original: 」時，解脫月復請言： 　　「無畏大士金剛藏，願說趣入第三地，　　柔和心者諸功德！

src_original: vimukticandra uvāca vajragarbhaviśāradam /  tṛtīyā saṃkramantānāmāśayaṃ bhaṇa sūraṇa // 6 //  upasaṃhāragāthāḥ /
tgt_original: 」爾時，金剛藏菩薩欲重宣其義而說頌曰：

src_original: te śuddha-āśaya guṇākara tīkṣṇacittā nirviṇṇa rāgavigatā anivartiyāśca /
tgt_original: 「清淨安住明盛心，　　厭離無貪無害心，
